questions.question: FAST TRACK - NO, THE RIDE, NOT THE LINE JUMP THING
HIS FAVORITE RIDE, TYLER THINKS THIS ATTRACTION LOOKS MORE LIKE TRON THAN A SIMULATION OF CAR TESTING TECHNOLOGY.
TYLER WAITED 90 MINUTES (ON PURPOSE) JUST FOR A CHANCE TO HAVE NOT-SIGOURNEY WEAVER WELCOME HIM TO THIS INCREDIBLE RIDE.
TYLER WOULD RATHER SEE AN ORDINARY MOON THAN A TERRIFYING MOON WITH THE FACE OF THIS CHARACTER FROM JOURNEY INTO IMAGINATION.
TYLER MADE A FOOL OF HIMSELF BY FLIRTATIOUSLY TELLING THIS MUSCULAR CHARACTER AT THEIR MEET AND GREET, "FORGET BELLE, I'D GO OUT WITH YOU!"
TYLER HAS GOTTEN SOAKED WITH WATER AT LEAST FOUR TIMES WHILE VOLUNTEERING TO SHOW OFF THE SPECIAL EFFECTS IN THIS NOW-SHUTTERED ATTRACTION.

questions.question: THIS FUTURE WORLD COUNTER SERVICE RESTAURANT IS ONE OF THE FEW THINGS LEFT IN INNOVENTIONS.
